byline.original: By HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

abstract: Five documentary films for marking National Hispanic Heritage Month.
snippet: Five documentary films for marking National Hispanic Heritage Month.
lead_paragraph: In honor of National Hispanic Heritage Month, here is another entry in our series of documentary film festivals. We're continuing our collaboration with SnagFilms, the parent of SnagLearning.

headline.main: Film Festival | Documentaries for Hispanic Heritage Month
